Text.Page:
The Red Lash pirates are getting close to our perimeter. Too close, if you ask me.

After all, why call it a perimeter if you're not going to enforce it?

Make sure the {@LinkCreature:11#4001#Red Lash crushers} and {@LinkCreature:11#4002#rovers} southwest of here stay away from our base. Heck, paint 'em a boundary line in their blood if you like.
What a find! The code is simple...It might take a while, but there shouldn't be a problem decoding it. Thank you, <PCNAME>!

See, it's all about setting boundariesâ€”and then enforcing them in a bloody, brutal way.

Reminds me of my childhood, actually.
